column1: #Text=JAKARTA , KOMPAS.com - " And the Healing Has Begun " merupakan lagu folk rock dari penyanyi asal Irlandia , Van Morrison .
#Text=Lagu tersebut rilis pertama kali pada 1979 , kemudian dinyanyikan ulang oleh Glen Hansard untuk film yang dibintangi nya , Once .
#Text=Film rilisan tahun 2007 tersebut bercerita tentang dua musisi yang sama-sama sedang berjuang di Irlandia .
#Text=Lirik dan Chord Lagu Drive All Night - Glen Hansard Simak lirik dan chord lagu " And the Healing Has Begun " versi Glen Hansard berikut ini .
#Text=Gunakan chord A D E sepanjang lagu .

#Text=And we ' ll walk down the avenue again And we ' ll walk down the avenue again When the healing has begun And we ' ll walk down the avenue in style And we ' ll walk down the avenue and we will smile And we ' ll say baby ain ' t it all worthwhile When the healing has begun When the healing has begun I want you to put on your pretty summer dress , yeah You can wear your Easter bonnet , Sunday clothes and all the rest And I wanna make love to you , yes yes , yes yes When the healing has begun I want you to put on your pretty summer dress You can wear your Easter clothes , Sunday bonnet and all the rest And I wanna make love to you , yes yes , yes yes When the healing has begun When the healing has begun We ' re gonna make sweet music underneath the stars We ' ll play to the violin and the two guitars And we ' ll sit down and play for hours and hours and hours and hours and hours When the healing has begun When the healing has begun We ' re gonna stay out all night long And then we ' re gonna go out and roam across the field Baby you know how it feels When the healing has begun When the healing has begun I want you to put on your pretty summer dress , yes You can wear your Easter clothes , Sunday bonnet and all the rest And I wanna make love to you , yes yes yes , yes , yes When the healing has begun And we ' ll walk down the avenue again And we ' ll walk down the avenue again And the healing has begun
